dialogue_turns.speaker: Kazhydromet's latest forecast for the 24th, 25th, and 26th of May.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, they're uh, warning about frosts in several regions, like West Kazakhstan, Aktobe, Kostanay...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, they're uh, warning about frosts in several regions, like West Kazakhstan, Aktobe, Kostanay...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the night of May 25, frosts are forecast in the West Kazakhstan, Aktobe, Kostanay, Akmola, and North Kazakhstan regions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, nighttime temperatures dropping to 1 to 3 degrees Celsius, which is just wild for late May.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, nighttime temperatures dropping to one to three degrees Celsius, which is just wild for late May.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nighttime temperatures in these areas may drop to 1"3ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's that northern anticyclone moving in after all that rain and thunder. Really unusual this time of year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's that northern anticyclone moving in after all that rain and thunder. Really unusual this time of year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to forecasters, following the cyclone that brought thunderstorms and rain across most of the country, a northern anticyclone is now moving in.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're saying it poses a serious risk to crops and garden plants. Farmers must be on high alert.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're saying it poses a serious risk to crops and garden plants. Farmers must be on high alert.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Specialists warn that this kind of weather poses a risk to agricultural crops and garden plants, and residents are advised to take precautionary measures.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. I mean, Minister Yerlan Nysanbayev had already hinted at a variable summer, but this is more immediate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. I mean, Minister Yerlan Nysanbayev had already hinted at a variable summer, but this is more immediate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Minister of Ecology and Natural Resources Yerlan Nysanbayev shared the weather forecast for the upcoming summer in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he mentioned June temps could hit up to 45 in the southwest—that's intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he mentioned June temps could hit up to forty five in the southwest-that's intense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But for now, it's all about staying warm at night. They're even including Pavlodar region in the frost advisory by the 26th.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But for now, it's all about staying warm at night. They're even including Pavlodar region in the frost advisory by the twenty sixth.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So we've got this weird mix—late spring frosts, but then potentially a hotter than normal August and September.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So we've got this weird mix-late spring frosts, but then potentially a hotter than normal August and September.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In August and September, less rainfall is expected, and temperatures may be about 1ÂC above normal.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and rainfall's all over the place too. A bit above normal in some parts, then drier later.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and rainfall's all over the place too. A bit above normal in some parts, then drier later.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rainfall in June and July is expected to be within normal levels, though the north, south, and southeast may receive slightly more. In August and September, less rainfall is expected, and temperatures may be about 1ÂC above normal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a good reminder that these are preliminary forecasts though, things can always shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a good reminder that these are preliminary forecasts though, things can always shift.

dialogue_turns.text: For sure. But still, if you're in those northern areas, maybe don't put those tender plants out just yet.
